import React from 'react'; import{Carousel, Container} from "react-bootstrap"; import Movie from './Serie'; import Navigation from './Head'; import { useState } from 'react'; const Home = () => { const[input,SetInput] = useState('') const getInput = (e) =>{ SetInput (e.target.value) /******Data get****/ const [film, setFilme] = useState([]) const getfilm = ()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:3004/posts') .then ((response) => {setFilme(response.data); }); console.log(film) } return (

) }} export default Home;
